Why join us?


  • Great Leadership Opportunity With Work Life Balance
  • Highly competitive base pay
  • Great benefits
  • Top LA Firm
  • Tight knit culture
  • Family environment

Job Details

Job Description

We are seeking an experienced and detail-oriented Senior Tax Preparer to join our dynamic team at a reputable public accounting firm based in Woodland Hills, California. This remote position requires a highly skilled professional with a strong background in tax preparation and a commitment to providing exceptional client service.

Key Responsibilities

Prepare and review individual, corporate, partnership, and fiduciary tax returns.

Conduct thorough tax research and stay updated on tax laws and regulations.

Provide tax planning and advisory services to clients.

Assist in resolving tax issues and disputes with tax authorities.

Mentor and supervise junior tax preparers, providing guidance and support.

Collaborate with other team members to ensure accurate and timely filing of tax returns.

Maintain confidentiality and security of sensitive financial information.

Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Easy Apply" button.
